OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
  ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, De=
cember 19, 2000 10:31 AM
  Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe t=
he three should get help.


  Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sce=
en of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mentall=
y reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three unt=
il they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pul=
led his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to,=
 your choice."

  He aproached the three bots ready for battle and hoping t=
hat things won't be ended peacefully.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
 From: dachande 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, December 18,=
 2000 7:40 PM
    Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


    ::Eclipse/=
Wolveritron/Ramus::
     
        They had heard the battling and decided t=
o run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ra=
n into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they exited the base, in bea=
st modes. And headed far away.


          eGroups Sponsor
